page.title: 10BULL POINT PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content:
My topic is school. I like school. It is good especially with Mr. Partridge because he does not give us hard work all the time. I like drawing the school badge it is colourful and I enjoy it. My favorite things in school are maths,spelling,reading and playing on the computer. It is fun.
I also like writing and swimming. When I come in from play I go straight on to my spelling and when I finish my spelling I do my reading. Reading is a story that you read and look at the pictures. And then Sir tells us to do something. Then we do some work and then it is dinner time. We have our dinner and then we play. The whistle goes and we go into class get into our swimming gear and go into the swimming pool and we swim then get dressed.
